description: She is the childhood friend of Kazama. Secretly, she has a one-sided love for him. She is aware that Kazama has a terminal illness and wants him to take the life-threatening surgery that would save his life. Kiyomi goes to Seijo University with Haruto, Asuka, Nanami, Takashi and Akari. She and Takashi began dating. Her relationship with Takashi went slowly, given their different personalities, until they finally made love. When Kiyomi found out that she was three months pregnant, she told Yuzuki about her pregnancy herself, and openly stated that she loves Takashi and wants to give birth to his child.
name: Asakura Kiyomi
